other_tests.findings: Normal pulmonary function tests; FVC 3.45 liters (101% of predicted), FEV1 2.62 liters (97%), FEV1/FVC ratio 0.76, total lung capacity 5.30 liters (97%), carbon monoxide diffusing capacity 22.4 (92%).
Bilaterally peripheral nodules, broad-based nodular pleural thickening, linear bands adjacent to many peripheral nodules; a few peripheral opacities present in the middle lung zone.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Largely unchanged; an 8-mm nodule was seen in the left apex at follow-up.

other_tests.findings: Marked pleural thickening with dense fibroelastotic tissue; extension into lung parenchyma along lobular septa.
